Road Transport

Dangerous Goods

Dangerous goods classes services | Truelog Singapore
  1. Home

Dangerous Goods

Dangerous goods classes by Truelog ensures safe handling and compliance. Enhance your logistics with our expert services.

Email us on

sales@truelog.com.sg

WhatsApp Custom Enquires

+65 9771 8172

Give us a call on

+65 6909 3756

Specializing in Class 9 batteries for IT equipment

DG Shipping Services

TrueLog ensures safe and compliant shipping of hazardous cargo, prioritizing safety and regulatory adherence.

Shipping and Transporting Batteries

TrueLog ensures to meet the requirements for Ion Batteries (UN3480/UN3481) and Metal Batteries (UN3090/UN3091), in compliance with current IATA dangerous goods regulations.

Safety Compliance

We provide meticulous documentation and adhere to strict safety standards, ensuring your cargo meets all necessary legal and safety requirements.

System Integration

Our advanced system integration allows for automated documentation processes, reducing errors and streamlining logistics operations.

Transportation Regulations

TrueLog stays up-to-date with global transportation regulations, guaranteeing that your shipments comply with the latest laws and standards.

Competitive Rates

We offer competitive pricing for global shipping services, delivering cost-effective solutions without compromising on quality or reliability.

Our Company In Number

Offices & Logistic Facilities
0

0 +
Professional Workers
0 +

Connect with Our Experts Today!

Schedule a call, book a meeting, or reach out with your questions—we’re here to help.
Get a Free Consultation

More Information:

  • Packaging Solutions
  • Documentation Support
